name: Fonzie Saves the Universe
description:
AYYYYYYYY!

The Shark that the Fonz jumped is back for revenge. Luckily, Fonzie's got the superpowers needed to stop him. Can you dodge everything that's thrown at you?

Credits:

AYYYYYY voice: South Park

Music:

Happy Days Opening

Phyrnna: Jump Into Battle / Under My Skin / z0MG VICTORY!
